Posts.EditableText: Hey folks Merrie here I'm back and working with the engine again, hope all are doing well. Got alot of Doctor appointments this week (Cancer survivor) but I'm doing pretty good overall. I have to go through this every 6 months, but Im alive and kicking thats what matters!
Posts.HTML: Hey folks Merrie here I'm back and working with the engine again, hope all are doing well. Got alot of Doctor appointments this week (Cancer survivor) but I'm doing pretty good overall. I have to go through this every 6 months, but Im alive and kicking thats what matters!

Posts.EditableText: Congratulations, and welcome back! Looking forward to your future games and contribution!
